description:
When suffering from injuries caused by the negligent or reckless actions of another person, Arizona clients know they can turn to the trusted personal injury law firm of Gage Mathers. Our team of experienced trial lawyers are dedicated to getting real results for our clients, and we understand what it takes to fight for justice on their behalves. Since our founding, we have recovered over $200 million for our clients.

For over 50 years, our law office has been fighting for the rights of those harmed through no fault of their own in various types of incidents, including the following:
• Trucking accidents & crashes
• Motor vehicle accidents
• Birth injuries
• Medical malpractice
• Construction accidents
• Sexual abuse
• Nursing home abuse
• Premises or products liability
• Brain injuries

Based in Phoenix, our reputation and record of success has brought us clients from throughout Arizona and across the United States. We also take personal injury cases that cross international boundary lines. Our extensive resources and dedicated team allow us to effectively serve clients and to provide a personal approach in each case we take, whether it's local or across the globe.

Clients turn to the experience of Gage Mathers during some of their darkest hours, often after suffering from catastrophic injuries or after losing a loved one in an unexpected and preventable accident. Our lawyers are genuinely committed to pursuing a beneficial outcome for those who rely upon us for the knowledgeable counsel and tenacious advocacy in their pursuit of justice. We offer free initial consultations, and you can schedule yours today by contacting our law office for an appointment.
